str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A festival, feast, periodically recurring. Of uncertain affinity; a festival.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
(a) din, hubbub, confused noise, outcry, (b) riot, disturbance. From the base of throeo; a disturbance.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
